phrases: Are you still going to pilot it?
No, I do not think so.
People will just hate me even more.
I have never done anything wrong,
but people have always treated me like a foreigner and hated me.
I accepted it and thought it made sense.
I am already in junior high, after all.
Rotten Tuna uploaded a new song!
Fleur, do not just sit there!
I update my blog where I please!
Chief, please answer if it is ringing.
I poured too much coffee, so I do not have a free hand.
But I got myself into some trouble.
My dad hates Noah, so I hid him here.
What are you going to do now, Ao?
No matter where I go, I will stand out because of my hair.
I told you to stay away from him!
You need to go back to the hospital!
It is his fault that our island ended up like this
Hitoga, take him to my training room.
He is pretty smart to think of this place.
No outsiders will be able to find it.
But the islanders all know about it.
We all played here when we were kids.
Does it have some special Japanese military lock?
The Japs did not engineer it by themselves.
They bought the other parts from the Americans and the French.
That means this thing is fat, surrenders when possible, and has terrible teeth.
You are not going to magically make it work
How the hell did that foreigner kid pilot it?
But that kid could fly an FP before elementary school.
To get the person who can pilot this.
But he said he is not going to pilot it...
We see you often in the news, but now we have got the real thing here.
You are like the Ghostbusters for G-Monsters, right?
I mean, you have even got a cartoon about you.
You help people in trouble, right?
Young lady, these people have already done their parts.
We will be fine with negotiations without you.
Hang on, I am bringing Allelujah.
So it is true that only children can pilot IFOs.
He is the pilot of the IFO yesterday?
What about the meeting with the SDF?
There will be more drinking than talking anyway.
I will leave the decision making to you.
This is the second Scub Coral that the Okinawa and Ryukyu Alliance have acquired.
We cannot allow research to be conducted on something so precious by outsiders.
The Scub Coral has not been completely destroyed!
If it is not dealt with, another Secret will emerge!
Oh, so that is what you scientists call G-Monsters.
I have never in my life heard of Secrets showing up at the same place twice.
We wish you a safe trip home.
Have you finished negotiating with the SDF?
I am here for our team's Elena Peoples.
Keep an eye on Scub Coral from a distance.
As long as the Quartz is still intact, Secrets will show up again.
Are you a spy for the Japs?!
I only know about the sea giant.
We are not asking you about a rock!
We are talking about the giant you pilo
Well, I frequented old Fukai's place ten years ago.
Your mother was still around at that time.
Do not get involved with a woman from the sky.
Ao's mother fell out of the empty sky.
Let us get out of here!
The Americans came looking for her, but Fukai Toshio hid her.
When Ao was born, everyone thought he was an alien...
And he is hated because of that?!
That woman and his son brought disaster upon us.
When you were around three, a Scub Burst happened nearby.
That is also when the Americans found your mother.
She was taken away and the Burst left with her.
It all happened because she angered the sea giant.
How could that be my... or my mother's fault?!
At the time, a few families who were on an excursion got caught up in the burst,
and the only one who survived was Arata's child, Naru.
So that is why I am hated?
Then tell me, what should I have done instead?
But we cannot forgive you or your mother.
So a trapar bubble emerged with the Scub Coral?
Is not that good a good thing?
We even lost fishing rights to China during the negotiations.
The island was a total mess back then.
The previous generation wanted to find someone to blame.
Let us do some fucking justice.
What does Generation Bleu want from him?
I once knew a girl with turquoise hair.
I want to know what color the boy's mother's hair was.
How did you start that IFO?
There was a girl who called it that.
What the hell are you doing?!
I do not know nothing about Jiro!
We will use him to negotiate with the Japs!
It is for the sake of Okinawa's true independence!
Are you out of your mind?!
We bullied him for being a foreigner when we were kids.
It is because our parents... the adults said so!
It is all his and his mother's fault!
We blamed it all on Ao!
But did you refuse the security money for the Scub?
Do not just talk about it!
Hey, what the heck is that?!
Will Dad and the others be able to get away in time?
They can all burn in hell.
You told me to protect the island yesterday!
Are not you on our side?
If so, keep your mouth shut.
We will go to war with the Japs and the Yankees!
I do not want to pilot it.
I ended up like this because I did!
Put me down at my grandpa's place.
But they set our house on fire!
Even so, you cannot hate them.
The adults were all born on this island and they will die on this island.
They have nowhere else to go.
They just want to protect it.
So that is why he apologized...
To the sea, if you can!
They are offering us some advice.
We are going to open fire at the G-Monster now.
The Secret will unleash a powerful electromagnetic burst in the area, rendering your electronics useless.
Conventional projectiles will cause it to react and be countered.
We have been telling everyone this for at least a decade, and they do not get it!
The Secrets' reactions are slow compared to FP's and IFO's.
The only IFOs in the area are the two of ours...
Our headquarters are negotiating a new contract with the Okinawan government.
But our analysis shows that the signals from the Scub Burst earlier are still present.
Therefore, our team Pied Piper will now engage and annihilate the Secret.
Some parts are always outside of the zones.
I am at the feet of the Scub, after all.
I am going to take them out, so watch out for the shots.
Did not you say you are not going to pilot it?
If you consider yesterday's one to be a fighter, then this one's the mothership!
Are you going to protect them?
The retarded adults who treated you like shit?
I do not want to pilot it.
If I do, I will be an alien.
But if I do not, I will regret it later.
I do not want to apologize to a child!
This will make Nirvash remember you.
I see... you remembered me this entire time...
Next time on Eureka Seven AO.
To protect the island, Ao throws himself in the battle to win.
His determination shakes people one after another.
What will the boy do as beyond hope and despair, he loses a place to return to?
Eureka Seven AO, episode 4: Walk This Way.
Listen the voice of the children of the stars.
kotae ga mitsukaranai koko de wa
tameiki wo tsuite sora wo miru
aoku somerareta hitomi no oku de kagayaiteru no wa
doko de mo yukeru, yume wo miteru
nobashita te wa asu wo egaku
kotae ga mitsukaranai koko de wa
tameiki wo tsuite sora wo miru
aoku somerareta hitomi no oku de kagayaiteru no wa
doko de mo yukeru, yume wo miteru
nobashita te wa asu wo egaku
so I sigh and look up at the sky
Shining deep within my eyes, reflecting its blue,
is a dreamer who can overcome anything
are dyed by rainbows and fly
so I sigh and look up at the sky
Shining deep within my eyes, reflecting its blue,
is a dreamer who can overcome anything
are dyed by rainbows and fly
itsu shika kokochi yoku najinde ite
me wo tsumuranaide itsu datte mae wo muku yo
i am about to mo mada umaku tobenai keredo
hitazura ni tsunaida te wo tadotte
sora ni kieteku bakari da toshite mo
mayowazu ni kimi wo sagashidaseru kara
itsu shika kokochi yoku najinde ite

mayowazu ni kimi wo sagashidaseru kara
My heart is racing and beating loud
Even if the wind is blowing hard
Do not close your eyes and always look on ahead
If you feel like crying, remember
The young birds in the sky sing
though they still cannot fly well
Even if we go beyond the edge of time
I will only follow you as we hold hands
So I never let you go!
may get lost in the infinity of the sky,
I can still find you without hesitation

Even if the wind is blowing hard
Do not close your eyes and always look on ahead
If you feel like crying, remember
The young birds in the sky sing

I will only follow you as we hold hands
